website_summaries.verdict: Choose this set for avid enthusiasts of the game or youngsters who want to add some favorite characters to their collections.
pros: Set of 6 characters with lots of interchangeable accessories
Popular among collectors who are into the online game, as they represent some of the most popular characters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product! Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: My son was waiting on the porch for this package! When it came he was so excited!! It came in the Roblox box shown in the pictures, and the figures had no flaws or missing parts! He plays with this all day everyday! You can’t beat this price either! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, what more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: The kids each got a different set and they all love them. What more can you ask for? FYI - Lots of small pieces so it's an age appropriate gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality for the little people who hold ur ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my granson,5 year old fits perfect in his little hands & enjoys playing with them every moment. Good quality n great price♥️
customer_reviews.author: BiBi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, but it took forever to arrive
customer_reviews.text: This was what my nephew wanted for his 6th birthday! So I gladly ordered! This vendor was not only an Amazon Prime but had several in stock! Why did it take several weeks to receive it? Telling a little kid his gift wasn’t here was heart breaking! When it arrived-it was in good shape and made my little love happy-but getting here was a huge issue for me! I see Prime vendors as my first choice because they’re “faster” I thought! Live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My son luvs it.
customer_reviews.text: My son luvs them, you can also mod the figures legs or hats do come apart for switcheroonies... ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Haha!

customer_reviews.title: Like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Really cute gift! Sturdy, made well and great starter for Roblox!

customer_reviews.title: Nice

customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and has collected numerous ROBLOX over the yrs. These were a bit hit for him!

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, box was kinda beat up and scratched which was surprising since I thought I was purchasing it as new. All parts seem to be in place, and I guess it’s the toys inside that matter.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fast shipping!

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Seemed to love it, I know his younger brother did

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My great-grandson turned 6 years old and likes Roblox so I purchased for his birthday. He was very happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Imitation
customer_reviews.text: Not the actual toy brand was definitely a knock off the paint looks like it can peel right off and there is paint on the actual package that was part of the toy
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the roblox gammer
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, they come with virtual points which is a double win. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Shaena

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift set for the Roblox players in your life with intercahngeable parts and articulating limbs.  Quality control YMMV
customer_reviews.text: The Roblox Masters of Roblox, 6 Action Figures are a cute set of 6 action figures with interchangeable attachments. The figures are surprisingly larger then I expected (measuring almost 2" in height. Articulating limbs operate smoothly with firm, smooth action. This should keep most fans of Roblox thoroughly entertained and should be durable enough given their construction. I would have given 5 stars but the finished product I received is just a bit off. Upon closer inspection the plastic injection molded heads have some pock marks/divits from manufacturing that are noticeable. Hopefully, they can quality check their products a bit more as some buyers may prefer to display these figures.
customer_reviews.author: MakeMeBuyIt

customer_reviews.title: Very Popular!
customer_reviews.text: Kids were super excited to receive this! Both my 5 year old and 12.5 year old couldn't wait to open this! They both picked their favorites and claimed them for themselves. They are sitting on my desk in their cardboard showcase, as I write this. My 12.5 year old was excited to see that the scooter actually works and scoots. He got a special Roblox accessory online with this pack (yes, he tried to explain it, but I have no idea...but, he was super excited!) He's already been requesting additional figures from this series. For the price, and the popularity of this game, it was a good purchase. I would purchase again as a gift or for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: AZmom

customer_reviews.title: Coordinates with Game on Phone
customer_reviews.text: My almost 9 year old grandson has started to play roblox on the smart phone, so I knew these action figures would be a big hit with him. The figures bend and move so you can have them do different activities, i.e., sit, stand, or ride the skateboard. The figures are larger than Lego figures, both in height and size. My grandson likes making little scenes out of the figures and then crashing them down. The figures seem to be pretty well made and have held up to his play for the past few weeks. He has asked for other figures from this set now that he has this se,t so I would say he really enjoys playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: Great characters, very imaginative--makes me feel like I'm 10 again!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't have a clue who Roblox Masters were (I'm old, lol) until I saw these, but I just have a thing for cool-looking toys. I have a home office that is literally filled with crazy character figures and these are my latest additions--and I love them! The characters are very interesting and they are very well made and I love some of the accessories (like Den_S' little shoulder cat pal). I also really like ChickenEngineer! And yes, of course I have since looked them up on Youtube and watched multliple videos since they arrived. Anyway really fun characters that now live on top of my monitors--awaiting discovery by my real cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Even Girls Like These
customer_reviews.text: If it's not Mind Craft, my granddaughter is obsessing over Roblox. She plays it so much that I have had to limit it to the weekends only. It's like it puts her in a trance. So when she got this toy she was ecstatic. It comes with several pieces include characters and vehicles. She has numerous sets including the Masters of Roblox 13 piece set and the Operation TNT set. I might mention that my granddaughter is 7 going on 8 in July and she has fun playing with these in conjunction to the video game version on her tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ymjauthor

customer_reviews.title: + 1⁄2*: Physical Distraction
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys playing Roblox--too much, in fact. She does also like to play with physical toys so I thought this might encourage her to take a break from the computer. It works but maybe not as much as I would like. Her review: I rated this 4 1⁄2 stars because it is kind of hard to put the accessories on and hard to take them off of the toy. Overall, great toy because I get free time.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Cadet

customer_reviews.title: fun set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of Roblox characters. My son recognized all of them in an instant. There is a bunch of accessories in the kit, you can mix and match hats and weapons and such. There is a lot of play value. The figures quite small, but they are much bigger than lego people. Figures can bend their knees and you can remove limbs to mix them, too. Quite a lot of fun for kids with imagination.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: but still liked it. the character that comes with a scooter ...
customer_reviews.text: cute! my 6yo likes roblox videos and likes this set. she wasn't familiar with any of these particular players, but still liked it. the character that comes with a scooter was a big hit. If you are sensitivie to these kinds of things, be aware that one character has "kill" in the name and another comes with a machine gun as an accessory.
customer_reviews.author: jennahw

customer_reviews.title: Roblox
customer_reviews.text: My boys think these figures are awesome. They seem like nonsense to me. But I do not play Roblox and they do. They love the characters. They are on the small side, but easily managed by small hands. My boys let to set them around while they play Roblox. Like some weird office or something. They love them. The quality is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and collectors too!
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun little Roblox collectable figures. My daughter has been playing Roblox for a couple of years now and she enjoys collecting the figures and the free download codes that are included. I do like that these are based off of actual players and Roblox designers, it gives them more of a personal feel.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made little toys, but they are little. This would be more of a party favor or very small gift for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Paulybrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Fans need this
customer_reviews.text: Fun set for Roblox fans - Mr Chicken was my favorite. Nice that they aren't blind bags but the packaging was difficult for an 11 yr old to tackle so adult help needed to unbox. Lots of accessories and love the mix and match heads! Lots of non screen play with these figures.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Roblox fans rejoice
customer_reviews.text: For the Roblox fan in your life, you really can't go wrong with this collection. It even includes a link to a digital asset in the game. This is a well made set and extends the game play off the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: These were suppose to be for Christmas but were opened early . They are wonderful my son loves them ! They come apart and you can out them together any way you want !
customer_reviews.author: N. A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy son!
customer_reviews.text: My son was very excited for this Roblox set in his Easter basket! Came exactly as pictured and seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: bctaccone

customer_reviews.title: Great for collectors
customer_reviews.text: This is great for collectors, but my elementary school age child hasn't played with it since the day he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old likes this set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set and set it up in his room. It is a nice set that brings the characters he likes in Roblox to life.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

product_meta.title: Roblox Action Collection - Masters of Roblox Six Figure Pack [Includes Exclusive Virtual Item]
product_meta.description: Style:Masters of RobloxYou've played their games, you've nominated them for awards, now you can display them on your shelf. Throw a Bloxy winner's party with Design It! fashion master tktech, Theme Park Tycoon 2's ridesmith Den_S, and Ultimate Driving's head mechanic TwentyTwoPilots. Dodge dinos with Dinosaur Simulator's ChickenEngineer. Build a delicious empire with Restaurant Tycoon's Ultraw. Wield the forces of nature with Elemental Battlegrounds' Robotmega. No matter your adventure, these devs are up to the challenge. Includes: 6 Figures, Accessories, Collector's Checklist, and an Exclusive Virtual Item Code
feature_bullets: Join six famous characters from the world of Roblox and create your own imaginative adventures
Mix and match parts to build your own unique Roblox character
Deck out your figures with the included accessories
Each package comes with a redeemable code to unlock an exclusive virtual item on Roblox
Collect all your favorite Roblox figures today

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
